doc.after: The Economy Class seats on long-haul flights have a 31-to-32-inch (79â81Â cm) pitch and are 17.5 inches (44Â cm) wide.[94][99] All seats are equipped with adjustable winged headrests, a 9-inch (23Â cm) PTV with AVOD, and a personal handset satellite telephone which can be used with a credit card.
